    • barryCentric

      @Contract(pure=true) public static float barryCentric​(@NotNull @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector3f p1, @NotNull @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector3f p2, @NotNull @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector3f p3, @NotNull @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector2f pos)
      method that performs barrycentric calculation,
      Parameters:
      p1 - Vector3f, 1st point of a triangle
      p2 - Vector3f, 2nd point of a triangle
      p3 - Vector3f, 3rd point of a triangle
      pos - Vector2f, position
      Returns:
      float, the height of the triangle of the position

    • createTransformationMatrix

      @NotNull public static @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Matrix4f createTransformationMatrix​(org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector2f translation, @NotNull @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector2f scale)
      Method that creates a transformation matrix out of a Vector2f translation.
      Parameters:
      translation - Vector2f, the vector that contains the transformation which will be turned into a Transformation matrix.
      scale - float, value that represents the scaling of the translation.
      Returns:
      Matrix4f, returns the transformation Matrix of the translation.

    • createTransformationMatrix

      @NotNull public static @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Matrix4f createTransformationMatrix​(org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector3f translation, float rx, float ry, float rz, float scale)
      Method that creates a transformation matrix out of a Vector3f translation.
      Parameters:
      translation - Vector3f, the vector that contains the transformation which will be turned into a Transformation matrix.
      rx - float, value that represents the rotation of the x-axis.
      ry - float, value that represents the rotation of the y-axis.
      rz - float, value that represents the rotation of the z-axis.
      scale - float, value that represents the scaling of the translation.
      Returns:
      Matrix4f, returns the transformation Matrix of the translation.

    • createViewMatrix

      @NotNull public static @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Matrix4f createViewMatrix​(@NotNull @NotNull Camera camera)
      Method that creates a view Matrix out of a camera object.
      Parameters:
      camera - Camera, the camera that will be turned into a view Matrix
      Returns:
      Matrix4f, returns the view Matrix from the Camera object.
